channel.title: Cold, latest sig
channel.description:
Still learning graphics etc, cut me a little slack. I want ratings on the ACTUAL image and not how it was made.
[b]Cold:[/b] V1: [img]http://img374.imageshack.us/img374/7808/rawrzi1.jpg[/img] V2: [img]http://img374.imageshack.us/img374/2561/lollllllcopyxc5.png[/img]
Took some advice and got rid of the white thing which I didnt really like (>_>) and then added a few brushes to the overall image which indirectly made it darker.

item.title: Cold, latest sig
item.dc:creator: @Son_of_Saetan Son of Saetan
item.description:
@Son_of_Saetan wrote:

I love the texture on #1, BUT, the middle ‘thing’ just ruins it. Maybe you could turn #1 into a nice soft abstract (no render!) sig

The ‘firery’ ones don’t need to be CnC, just scrap them…
